content: I want to learn about Identify larger quantity -- subtraction

B) 27
C) 18
D) 72

This question is designed to be straightforward and easy to understand, allowing the student to focus on identifying the larger quantity without getting bogged down in complex calculations. I'll be here to guide them through the solution and provide feedback on their answer.
